snippet: Steven Mackey is still something of an outsider. His electric guitar had been considered alien to classical music until he began to team it up with string quartets and write concertos for it.
abstract: New Jersey Symphony Orchestra will present East Coast premiere of Steven Mackey piano concerto Stumble to Grace; Mackey says concerto was inspired by watching his son Jasper learn to walk (Metropolitan/New Jersey).
lead_paragraph: Steven Mackey is still something of an outsider. His electric guitar had been considered alien to classical music until he began to team it up with string quartets and write concertos for it.

headline.seo: Steven Mackey Fits No Label in His Music
headline.main: A Composer Who Escapes Easy Labels
headline.print_headline: A Composer Who Escapes Easy Labels
